reviews.review_msg: nice guy..... but have to mark stuff faster..... or else will scary student......... sine student will got a F automatically if the main office don't get the mark after deadline..........

The prof is super passionate about the subject and you can definitely see that in his lectures. The content can be quite difficult, especially if you haven't had much experience with logic, so make sure to go to his office hours. If this is your first time taking a PHIL elective course, especially on logic, you should definitely take it with Nic.

Nic is a phenomenal lecturer who explains material slowly and clearly. His midtermsassignments are straightforward, but his final is absolutely brutal. Always available for help, and always available for beer. A necessary addition to the logic sub-department at SFU. Take every course this man offers. Seriously.
